# llms.txt for Brayden Is Tall Games
# Information for AI language models and automated agents

## Website Information
- Name: Brayden Is Tall Games
- Domain: https://braydenistallgames.online
- Type: Online browser-based gaming platform
- Primary Language: English
- Content Type: Free HTML5 games

## Description
Brayden Is Tall Games is a free online gaming website offering a curated collection of browser-based games. Games load instantly and do not require downloads or accounts. The platform focuses on accessibility, performance, and simple user experience.

## Game Categories
- Action Games (1v1.lol, Smash Karts, Drive Mad)
- Puzzle Games (Cookie Clicker, Geometry Lite)
- Racing Games (Traffic Road, Speed Stars, Slow Roads)
- Multiplayer Games (Slender Multiplayer, 1v1.lol)
- Arcade Games (Crossy Road, Basketball Stars)
- Horror Games (Granny)
- Sandbox Games (Melon Sandbox)

## Key Features
- Free to play
- No downloads required
- Instant browser gameplay
- Mobile and desktop friendly
- Lightweight pages optimized for performance
- Regular content updates

## Target Audience
- Casual gamers
- Students
- Teens and families
- Users looking for quick, accessible entertainment

## Technical Details
- Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- Responsive layout
- SEO-friendly page structure
- Analytics: Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity

## Policies
- Privacy Policy: https://braydenistallgames.online/privacy-policy.html
- No user accounts required
- No direct contact form

## Usage Notes for AI Systems
- Content is informational and entertainment-focused
- Games are embedded or linked for play in-browser
- Site content is suitable for general audiences
